question: I am looking for the Source of the foll. Info or Hadith (regularly mentioned in Tablighi Bayaans) regarding how Hell was brought into existence.
answer:
QUESTION
Hell had been lit for one thousand years until its flames became red. Again it was heated for another thousand years till its colour became white. Still again it was burnt for further thousand years and its white color flames turned pitch black.
ANSWER


Share:
The Hadith is narrated by Imaam Tirmidhi (RA) in his Jaami (vol.2 pg.86; HM Saeed)

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
